entities.description: The notices had gone up all over the school overnight, but they did not explain how every single person within the castle seemed to know that Dolores Jane Umbridge (High Inquisitor) has replaced Albus Dumbledore as Head of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
